DCC.ACOtherModHint: Modifier to AC that is not from equipment or ability that should be included in the auto calculation
DCC.ActionDiceInvalid: Character Action Dice doesn't contain a valid expression, defaulting to 1d20
DCC.ActionDiceSheetHint: Enter your primary action die here, set up multiple action dice in the </>Config menu in the title bar
DCC.ActorImportConfirmationMessage: This will import {number} actors. Are you sure you want to continue?
DCC.ActorImportPCHint:
For Zero-level PCs, you can use Purple Sorcerer to customize your party generation, just make sure you use Style/Format of 'Plain Text' at the bottom.

For Upper-level PCs, also make sure you use Style of 'Upper Level Text' at the bottom.
DCC.ActorImportNPCHint:
For NPC statlines, ensure you have the trailing period at the end, and you remove any non-standard stuff like armor.

Note: Crit Die and Table for NPCs is a best-guess calculation, you should double-check it after import.
DCC.AddClassLevelToInitiativeConfigHint: 对先攻添加职业等级（譬如战士）
DCC.AlreadyHasInitiative: Token already has initiative score in the Combat Tracker; not re-rolling
DCC.AsCoinsHint: Delete this item and move its value to your Funds
DCC.ActionDiceHint: Comma-separated list of character's Action Dice, e.g. 1d20,1d16
DCC.AttackBonusConfigModeHint: 战士/矮人应当使用「投骰每攻击」投骰壮举；其他使用平直
DCC.AttackRollEmote: {actorName} {actionName} with their {weaponName} and hits AC {rollHTML}{deedRollHTML} for {damageRollHTML} points of damage!{crit}{fumble}{twoWeaponNote}
DCC.BadValueFormulaWarning: Bad formula in item value field!
DCC.CheckPenaltyConfigHint: Check Penalty computed from armor if Compute (above) is checked; otherwise manually-entered value
DCC.ChooseAClass: You must use the Sheet option in the title bar to choose a class before you can change level.
DCC.ClericTabHint: 按手礼，驱散亵渎，神圣援助，设置法术检定
DCC.ComputeACConfigHint: Compute the Armor Class automatically from the Base AC Ability mod (set below) and equipped armor
DCC.ComputeCheckPenaltyConfigHint: Compute Check Penalty based on equipped armor and apply it to checks
DCC.ComputeInitiativeConfigHint: Compute Initiative based on Agility modifier and Warrior Level
DCC.ComputeMeleeAndMissileAttackAndDamag: 计算近战/投射的攻击/伤害
Automatically Compute the Melee and Missile Attack and Damage Boxes on the Character tab
DCC.ComputeSavingThrowsHint: Compute Saving Throws automatically - you can add adjustments to the calculation by clicking on a Saving Throw value
DCC.ComputeSpeedConfigHint: Compute Speed from Base Speed (below) and subtracting armor speed penalties
DCC.ConfigureHint: Use </>Config Menu in title bar to disable auto-calc
DCC.ConfigureSheetHint: Configure DCC-specific options for this character
DCC.DeleteItem: Delete this item from the sheet?
DCC.DeleteItemExplain: This will remove the item and cannot be undone
DCC.DisapprovalRangeHint: Current disapproval range - increase as your cleric gains disapproval, decrease as you lose it
DCC.DisapprovalTableHint: Table to use for disapproval results - only change if you build a custom table for your deity
DCC.DisplayValueHint: Display-only - use fields below and on the character tab to change this calculated value
DCC.DivineAidHint: Click to roll a Divine Aid check, CMD/CTRL for more options
DCC.ElfImmunities: Immune to magical sleep and paralysis
DCC.ElfLuckMod: Luck modifier to one level 1 spell
DCC.ElfTabHint: Detect secret doors, familiar, patron, corruptions
DCC.EffectsHelpText: 点击「创建效果」来为此角色的数据添加临时或永久调整效果
DCC.EffectsItemHelpText: Click 'Create Effect' to add modifications that will apply to the actor when this item is equipped.
DCC.EffectsTransferInfo: Effects on items can transfer to the actor when equipped. Use the 'Transfer to Actor' setting in the effect configuration.
DCC.FleetingLuckClearButtonTitle: Take all Fleeting Luck from all users
DCC.FleetingLuckClearTitle: Take all Fleeting Luck from this user
DCC.FleetingLuckGiveTitle: Award a point of Fleeting Luck to this user
DCC.FleetingLuckResetButtonTitle: Reset Fleeting Luck for a new session
DCC.FleetingLuckResetMessage: Fleeting Luck reset for all users
DCC.FleetingLuckSpendTitle: Spend Fleeing Luck for this user
DCC.FleetingLuckSpendNoLuckWarning: {user} has no Fleeting Luck to spend
DCC.FleetingLuckTakeTitle: Take a point of Fleeting Luck from this user
DCC.HitDieHint: Enter the hit die you roll each level, like 1d6
DCC.InitSheetHint: Initiative is auto-calculated, use </>Config Menu in title bar to change
DCC.InheritTooltip: Inherited from Actor. 见物品设置
DCC.InitiativeOtherModHint: Modifier to Initiative that is not from ability or level that should be included in the auto calculation
DCC.LayOnHandsHint: Click to roll a Lay on Hands check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.LevelTooltip: Click 'Level' to change your character's level if the Core Book Module is installed
DCC.LevelDataNotFound: Level Data not found - is the DCC Core Book module installed?
DCC.LevelIncreasePrompt: Do you want to increase or decrease your level?
DCC.LuckyBonusHint: Bonus to hit from a Warrior or Dwarf's lucky weapon
DCC.LuckyWeaponHint: Lucky Weapon this warrior chose at level 1 - reminder only
DCC.LuckyWeaponModHint: Character's luck modifier at level 1 - reminder only
DCC.MacroNoTokenSelected: You must select a token to run this macro
DCC.ManifestationRerollExplain: Discard previous Manifestation result and re-roll or look up based on entered number?
DCC.ManifestationTabHint: Roll and configure manifestation for this spell
DCC.MeleeAttackHint: Calculated from Attack Bonus + Strength Bonus
DCC.MeleeDamageHint: Calculated from Attack Bonus (deed die) for Warriors and Dwarves + Strength Bonus, or just Strength Bonus for others
DCC.MeleeMissileBonusConfigHint: These fields adjust the auto-calculated values
DCC.MercurialMagicRerollExplain: Discard previous Mercurial Magic result and re-roll or look up based on entered number?
DCC.MercurialMagicRerollPrompt: Re-roll or Lookup Mercurial Magic Roll?
DCC.MercurialTabHint: Roll and configure mercurial magic for this spell
DCC.MigrationComplete: Finished migration to DCC System version {systemVersion}!
DCC.MigrationInfo: Beginning DCC System Migration to version {systemVersion}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server
DCC.MissileAttackHint: Calculated from Attack Bonus + Agility Bonus
DCC.MissileDamageHint: Calculated from Attack Bonus (deed die) for Warriors and Dwarves only
DCC.Name: 名称
DCC.NoModifiableTerms: No modifiable terms found in roll formula
DCC.NoSpellResultsTableWarning: Spell Results Table not defined for this spell
DCC.OverrideHint: 全量覆盖数值，禁用自动计算
DCC.ParsePlayerWarning: Failed to read player characters (expecting Purple Sorcerer Plain Text or JSON)
DCC.ParseSingleNPCWarning: Failed to read one or more NPC/monster (expecting one or more DCC statblocks)
DCC.ParseSinglePlayerWarning: Failed to read one or more player characters from Purple Sorcerer Plain Text
DCC.PasteBlock: Paste In A Stat Block to Import
DCC.PartyDeleteExplain: 这会将此角色移出冒险团队
DCC.RemoveEmptyItemsConfigHint: Remove items from character sheet once they have zero quantity
DCC.RollAgilityCheckHint: Click to roll an Agility check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollIntelligenceCheckHint: Click to roll an Intelligence check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollLuckCheckHint: Click to roll a Luck check (roll under Luck score) - Click 'Modifier' to roll adding modifier instead, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollLuckCheckModHint: Click to roll a Luck check adding Luck modifier, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollPersonalityCheckHint: Click to roll a Personality check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollSavingThrowHint: Click to roll this save, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollSkillCheckHint: Click to roll this skill, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollSpellCheckHint: Click to roll a Spell Check, CMD/CTRL click for more options - the roll button on spells on the spells tab is a better option in most cases
DCC.RollStaminaCheckHint: Click to roll an Stamina check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollStrengthCheckHint: Click to roll a Strength check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.RollWisdomCheckHint: Click to roll a Wisdom check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.SavingThrowAdjustmentsConfigHint: 调整此角色的豁免投骰
DCC.SavingThrowOtherBonusHint: Other consistent bonus to this save (e.g. from Lucky roll)
DCC.SavingThrowOverrideHint: Override the auto-calculation with this value, ignoring all other values
DCC.SettingAutomateClericDisapprovalHint: 为牧师自动应用不悦范围提升和投骰不悦结果用于牧师的类法术能力和施法模式设置为「牧师」的法术
DCC.SettingAutomateDamageFumblesCrits: 自动伤害/大成功/大失败
DCC.SettingAutomateDamageFumblesCritsHin: 投骰攻击后，自动投骰伤害、大成功、大失败
DCC.SettingAutomateFleetingLuckHint: 自动根据投骰结果记录 Fleeting 幸运
DCC.SettingAutomateWizardSpellLoss: 自动法师/精灵法术丧失
DCC.SettingAutomateWizardSpellLossHint: 施法失败时，自动标记法术丧失用于法师/精灵法术检定按钮和施法模式设置为「牧师」的法术
DCC.SettingCriticalHitsCompendiumHint: 寻找大成功命中表的合集——合集名称的开头必须设置为 Crit Table XXX（XXX 是角色的命中表）
DCC.SettingDeleteItemHint: 在删除角色卡的装备/法术/自定义技能前，询问确认
DCC.SettingDisapprovalTablesCompendiumHi: 寻找不悦表的合集牧师角色卡中可选特定表格
DCC.SettingDivineAidTableHint: 为神圣援助投骰表格——必须在合集中存在
DCC.SettingEmoteRollsHint: 将投骰聊天卡片转换为叙事表情
DCC.SettingEnableFleetingLuckHint: 启用 Fleeting 幸运用户内嵌元素
DCC.SettingFumbleTableHint: 为大失败投骰表格——必须在合集中存在
DCC.SettingLayOnHandsTableHint: 为按手礼投骰表格——必须在合集中存在
DCC.SettingManualCompendiumConfiguration: 不使用核心书模组，而是自行建立数据库合集——不推荐
DCC.SettingMercurialMagicTableHint: 为无常魔法投骰表格——必须在合集中存在
DCC.SettingShowRollModifierByDefault: 默认显示调整投骰对话框
DCC.SettingShowRollModifierByDefaultHint: 无需按住 ⌘/CTRL，点击角色卡物品就显示调整投骰对话框
DCC.SettingTurnUnholyTableHint: 为驱散亵渎投骰表格——必须在合集中存在
DCC.SettingWeaponEquipmentCheckHint: 若所用武器未装备，避免投骰并报错
DCC.SettingDisableDarkThemeIconFilter: 禁用深色主题下的图标滤镜
DCC.SettingDisableDarkThemeIconFilterHin: 使用深色主题时，禁用图标的棕褐色滤镜
DCC.SettingChatCardsUseAppThemeHint: 启用时，聊天卡片遵循核心应用主题（明亮/黑暗）设置禁用时，聊天卡片改为遵循内嵌主题设置

DCC.Settings.ShowWelcomeDialogHint: 当模组启动时显示欢迎台词

DCC.ShieldBashHint: Die size to use for shield bash attacks; set up a shield bash weapon in the equipment tab and use this as the action die override.
DCC.ShowBackstabConfigHint: Show Backstab attack option in Equipment tab for weapons (e.g. for Thieves)
DCC.ShowMercurialTabInfo: Show the Mercurial Effect tab of the item sheet regardless of casting mode
DCC.ShowSkillsConfig: 显示自定义技能标签页
DCC.ShowSkillsConfigHint: Show Custom Skills Tab (e.g. to add clickable custom skills for custom classes)
DCC.ShowSpellsConfig: 显示自定义技能法术页
DCC.ShowSpellsConfigHint: Show Custom Spells Tab (e.g. to add spells for classes that normally don't have spells)
DCC.ShowSwimFlySpeedConfigHint: Show Swim and Fly speed boxes on character sheet
DCC.SheetHint: Click to choose a sheet, which sets your character class
DCC.SkillApplyCheckPenaltyHint: 为此技能应用来自护甲的检定惩罚
DCC.SkillDieHint: Inherited from actor, use </> Config in title bar to change this
DCC.SkillUseLevelHint: Adds character level to the skill check, useful for third-party skills that scale with level
DCC.SkillUseAbilityHint: 使用标题栏的「</>设置」来启用
DCC.SortInventoryConfigHint: Sort items by equipment tab within their sections
DCC.SpellCastingAttributeHint: Attribute modifier from your primary spell casting attribute
DCC.SpellCastingModeInfo: 选择法师/牧师/泛用施法规则
DCC.SpellCheckNoOwnedItemWarning: Cannot roll a spell check with a spell you don't own
DCC.SpellCheckNonSpellWarning: Cannot roll a spell check with a non-spell item
DCC.SpellCheckOtherModHint: Modifier to Spell Checks that is not from ability or level that should be included in the auto calculation
DCC.SpellOtherBonusHint: Bonus to this spell's spell check (e.g. elf level 1 bonus)
DCC.SpellDuelAddParticipantTitle: Add selected token(s) to the spell duel
DCC.SpellDuelEnterBothChecks: Please enter both spell check values
DCC.SpellDuelManualLookup:
Spell Duel Exchange
{attacker} ({attackerCheck}) vs {defender} ({defenderCheck})
Winner: {winner}

Look up the result on Table 4-5 (p.{page}) in the DCC rulebook, then roll on Table 4-6.
DCC.SpellDuelNeedTwoParticipants: Need at least two participants to resolve an exchange
DCC.SpellDuelNoParticipants: No participants yet. Select tokens and click Add Selected.
DCC.SpellDuelNoParticipantsDropHint: Drag actors here or select tokens and click Add Selected.
DCC.SpellDuelResolveExchangeTitle: Resolve a spell duel exchange between participants
DCC.SpellDuelResolveInstructions: Have each participant roll their spell check from their character sheet, then enter the results below.
DCC.SpellDuelSameParticipant: Attacker and defender must be different
DCC.SpellDuelSelectToken: Select one or more tokens to add to the spell duel
DCC.SpellTabHint: 等级，射程，其他基础法术数据
DCC.SettingSpellSideEffectsCompendiumHin: The Spell Side Effects Compendium holds the tables for spell manifestations and corruptions
DCC.SettingStrictCriticalHitsHint: 启用时，大成功命中范围会随骰子规模而缩放。譬如，若平常大成功在 20 但投骰了 d24，则大成功改为在 24若平常大成功在 18–20 但投骰了 d24，则大成功改为在 22–24
DCC.SpellSideEffectsCompendiumNotFoundWa: The 'Spell Side Effects Compendium' was not found, you will either need to make one or activate the Core Book Module
DCC.SpellTabHelp: 从物品合集中拖入一个法术物品，或点击右上角的「+添加」
DCC.ThiefBackstabSkillHint: There is a backstab button on each weapon on the equipment that that can be used to roll a backstab
DCC.ThiefSkillHint: Click to roll this skill, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.ThiefTabHint: Find traps, climb walls, sneak silently, etc.
DCC.Title: 头衔
DCC.TokenHint: Configure the default token for your character, which is used when you drag them onto the map
DCC.TurnUnholyHint: Click to roll a Turn Unholy check, CMD/CTRL click for more options
DCC.UndergroundSkills: 背景技能：嗅闻黄金/宝石，寻找建筑
DCC.WeaponDamageBonusHint: Bonus to damage with this weapon for all attacks
DCC.WeaponDamageHint: Base Weapon Damage without bonuses (include those in Weapon Bonus below)
DCC.WeaponNotFound: Unable to find a weapon with id '{id}'
DCC.WeaponPropertiesBackstabDamageHint: Additional Damage bonus only when this weapon is used for a Backstab
DCC.WeaponPropertiesRangeTooltip: Not applicable for a melee weapon
DCC.TwoWeaponPrimaryHint: This weapon is used for two-weapon fighting, and is in the primary hand.
DCC.TwoWeaponSecondaryHint: This weapon is used for two-weapon fighting and is in the off hand.
DCC.HalflingTwoWeaponFumbleNote: Fumble only applies if both attack rolls were a natural 1.
